title: Barry Jenkins and Meg Wolitzer on Two of This Season's Novels on Screen
description: Jenkins talks about his adaptation of James Baldwin's "If Beale Street Could Talk," and Wolitzer discusses the adaptation of her novel "The Wife."
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
content:encoded: Jenkins talks about his adaptation of James Baldwin's "If Beale Street Could Talk," and Wolitzer discusses the adaptation of her novel "The Wife."
